description: Weekly Python labs with exercises and tutor demonstrations, plus two self-directed labs on spreadsheet and Matlab involving video tutorials and submitted exercises. Includes multiple choice questions and correctness-based marking.
Individual Python programming project solving extended computational problems. Marked on code correctness and style adherence. Includes feedback report.
Individual Python programming project solving extended computational problems. Marked on code correctness and style adherence. Includes feedback report.
Practical laboratory exam during UNSW exam period (2-3 hours duration). Features programming questions and multiple choice questions testing Python, Matlab, and spreadsheet skills.
